name: cfretry
description: Used within a catch block to jump back to the beginning of the try statement.

examples.title: Tag Syntax - basic example
examples.description: Throw an error and retry within cfcatch until the iteration counter is equal to 3.
examples.code:
<cfoutput>
<cfset iterations = 1/>
<cfset limit = 3/>

<cftry>
	<cfif iterations EQ limit>
		Done!
	<cfelse>
		<cfthrow type='Custom' message='Too soon. '/>
	</cfif>

	<cfcatch>
		#cfcatch.message#

		<cfset iterations += 1/>
		<cfif iterations LE limit>
			<cfretry/>
		</cfif>
	</cfcatch>
</cftry>
</cfoutput>

examples.title: Script Syntax - basic example
examples.description: Throw an error and retry within catch until the iteration counter is equal to 3.
